  • Method Details

    • warmUpInMemoryCache

      void warmUpInMemoryCache(String warmUpKeyPattern)
      Warm up the in-memory cache by searching for the given key pattern in Redis.
      Parameters:
      warmUpKeyPattern -

    • read

      V read(K key, long acceptableCreatedTimestamp, Function<K,? extends V> function)
      Read the given key from the cache. If this key is not found, or the value was written into cache before the acceptable created timestamp, the given function will be called to compute the latest value.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      acceptableCreatedTimestamp - the earliest timestamp that the value was written into cache to be considered valid
      function - the function to compute the value associated with the given key
      Returns:
      the value associated with the given key

    • read

      V read(K key, Function<K,? extends V> function)
      Read the given key from the cache. If this key is not found, the given function will be called to compute a value.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      function - the function to compute the value associated with the given key
      Returns:
      the value associated with the given key

    • read

      V read(K key)
      Read the given key from the cache.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      Returns:
      the value associated with the given key, or null if the key is not found

    • write

      void write(K key, V value)
      Write the given key-value pair into the cache.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to write
      value - the value associated with the given key

    • delete

      void delete(K key)
      Delete the given key from the cache.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to delete
